languages.text:
Дополнительное {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g}, которое персонаж может получить из-за некоторых эффектов или {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}. В бою при получении {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} в первую очередь снимается {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g}, и только после этого урон приходится на основное здоровье персонажа.
Временное здоровье остается на персонаже до конца боя, либо пока он не получит урон, равный временному здоровью.
Если несколько разных источников дают персонажу временное здоровье, они не складываются — персонаж получит временное здоровье от наибольшего источника.

Additional {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} granted by certain effects and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. When a character suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in combat, {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are deducted first, followed by the character's regular wounds.
Temporary wounds generally stay until the end of combat or until the character loses them by suffering damage.
When a character gains temporary wounds from multiple sources, these temporary wounds do not stack with each other — the character only benefits from the source that grants the most temporary wounds.
languages.original_text:
Дополнительные очки {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, который персонаж может получить из-за некоторых эффектов или способностей. В бою при получении урона в первую очередь снимается временное здоровье, и только после этого урон наносится по основным очкам здоровья персонажа.
Временное здоровье остается на персонаже до конца боя, либо пока он не получит урон, равный временному здоровью.
Если несколько разных источников дают персонажу временное здоровье, они не складываются — персонаж получит временное здоровье от наибольшего источника.

traits.locale_text:
Additional {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} granted by certain effects and abilities. When a character suffers damage in combat, temporary wounds are deducted first, followed by the character's regular wounds.
Temporary wounds generally stay until the end of combat or until the character loses them by suffering damage.
When a character gains temporary wounds from multiple sources, these temporary wounds do not stack with each other — the character only benefits from the source that grants the most temporary wounds.

Additional {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} granted by certain effects and abilities. When a character suffers damage in combat, temporary wounds are deducted first, followed by the character's regular wounds.
Temporary wounds generally stay until the end of combat or until the character loses them by suffering damage.
When a character gains temporary wounds from multiple sources, these temporary wounds do not stack with each other — the character only benefits from the source that grants the most temporary wounds.

Additional {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} granted by certain effects and abilities. When a character suffers damage in combat, temporary wounds are deducted first, followed by the character's regular wounds.
Temporary wounds generally stay until the end of combat or until the character loses them by suffering damage.
When a character gains temporary wounds from multiple sources, these temporary wounds do not stack with each other — the character only benefits from the source that grants the most temporary wounds.

Additional {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} granted by certain effects and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. When a character suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in combat, {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are deducted first, followed by the character's regular wounds.
Temporary wounds generally stay until the end of combat or until the character loses them by suffering damage.
When a character gains temporary wounds from multiple sources, these temporary wounds do not stack with each other — the character only benefits from the source that grants the most temporary wounds.

languages.text:
Zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, die durch bestimmte Effekte und {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} entstehen. Wenn ein Charakter im Kampf {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleidet, werden zuerst die temporären {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}Wunden{/g} abgezogen, gefolgt von den normalen Wunden des Charakters.
Temporäre Wunden bleiben in der Regel bis zum Ende des Kampfes bestehen oder bis der Charakter sie durch Schaden verliert.
Wenn ein Charakter temporäre Wunden aus mehreren Quellen erhält, werden diese temporären Wunden nicht miteinander addiert — der Charakter profitiert nur von der Quelle, die die meisten temporären Wunden gewährt.
languages.original_text:
Additional {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} granted by certain effects and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. When a character suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in combat, {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are deducted first, followed by the character's regular wounds.
Temporary wounds generally stay until the end of combat or until the character loses them by suffering damage.
When a character gains temporary wounds from multiple sources, these temporary wounds do not stack with each other — the character only benefits from the source that grants the most temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text:
Zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, die durch bestimmte Effekte und Fähigkeiten entstehen. Wenn ein Charakter im Kampf Schaden erleidet, werden zuerst die temporären Wunden abgezogen, gefolgt von den normalen Wunden des Charakters.
Temporäre Wunden bleiben in der Regel bis zum Ende des Kampfes bestehen oder bis der Charakter sie durch Schaden verliert.
Wenn ein Charakter temporäre Wunden aus mehreren Quellen erhält, werden diese temporären Wunden nicht miteinander addiert — der Charakter profitiert nur von der Quelle, die die meisten temporären Wunden gewährt.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Blessures{/g} supplémentaires conférées par certains effets et {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}. Lorsqu'un personnage subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} lors d'un combat, ses {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} sont les premières déduites, suivies de ses blessures standard.
Les blessures temporaires persistent généralement jusqu'à la fin du combat ou jusqu'à ce que le personnage les perde en subissant des dégâts.
Lorsqu'un personnage obtient des blessures temporaires auprès de différentes sources, celles-ci ne sont pas cumulables. Le personnage bénéficie uniquement de celles qui proviennent de la source qui en confère le plus.
languages.original_text:
Additional {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} granted by certain effects and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. When a character suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in combat, {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are deducted first, followed by the character's regular wounds.
Temporary wounds generally stay until the end of combat or until the character loses them by suffering damage.
When a character gains temporary wounds from multiple sources, these temporary wounds do not stack with each other — the character only benefits from the source that grants the most temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Blessures{/g} supplémentaires conférées par certains effets et capacités. Lorsqu'un personnage subit des dégâts lors d'un combat, ses blessures temporaires sont les premières déduites, suivies de ses blessures standard.
Les blessures temporaires persistent généralement jusqu'à la fin du combat ou jusqu'à ce que le personnage les perde en subissant des dégâts.
Lorsqu'un personnage obtient des blessures temporaires auprès de différentes sources, celles-ci ne sont pas cumulables. Le personnage bénéficie uniquement de celles qui proviennent de la source qui en confère le plus.

languages.text:
临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}为角色额外的生命值，由特定效果与{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}产生。当角色在战斗中受伤时，会首先扣除{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，之后扣除常规生命值。
临时生命值通常只会维持至战斗结束，或在角色承受{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}之后消失。
当某个角色从多个来源处获得临时生命值时，这些临时生命值效果不会叠加，只有最强大的效果会发挥作用。
languages.original_text:
Additional {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} granted by certain effects and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. When a character suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in combat, {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are deducted first, followed by the character's regular wounds.
Temporary wounds generally stay until the end of combat or until the character loses them by suffering damage.
When a character gains temporary wounds from multiple sources, these temporary wounds do not stack with each other — the character only benefits from the source that grants the most temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text:
临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}为角色额外的生命值，由特定效果与能力产生。当角色在战斗中受伤时，会首先扣除临时生命值，之后扣除常规生命值。
临时生命值通常只会维持至战斗结束，或在角色承受伤害之后消失。
当某个角色从多个来源处获得临时生命值时，这些临时生命值效果不会叠加，只有最强大的效果会发挥作用。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Heridas{/g} adicionales concedidas por algunos efectos y {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}. Cuando un personaje sufre {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} en combate, primero pierde las {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} y después las normales.
Las heridas temporales suelen permanecer hasta el final del combate o hasta que el personaje las pierde al sufrir daños.
Cuando un personaje gana heridas temporales por varios motivos, las heridas temporales no se acumulan: el personaje solo se beneficia de la fuente que más heridas temporales proporciona.
languages.original_text:
Additional {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} granted by certain effects and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. When a character suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in combat, {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are deducted first, followed by the character's regular wounds.
Temporary wounds generally stay until the end of combat or until the character loses them by suffering damage.
When a character gains temporary wounds from multiple sources, these temporary wounds do not stack with each other — the character only benefits from the source that grants the most temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Heridas{/g} adicionales concedidas por algunos efectos y capacidades. Cuando un personaje sufre daño en combate, primero pierde las heridas temporales y después las normales.
Las heridas temporales suelen permanecer hasta el final del combate o hasta que el personaje las pierde al sufrir daños.
Cuando un personaje gana heridas temporales por varios motivos, las heridas temporales no se acumulan: el personaje solo se beneficia de la fuente que más heridas temporales proporciona.

languages.original_text:
Additional points {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}health{/g}, which the character may receive due to some effects or abilities. In combat, when a character takes damage, temporary health is removed first, and only then is the damage applied to the character's main health points.
Temporary health remains on the character until the end of the battle, or until the character takes damage equal to the temporary health.
If several different sources give the character temporary health, they do not stack — the character will receive temporary health from the largest source.

languages.text:
特定の効果や{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}によって追加で与えられる{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}。キャラクターが戦闘中に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けた場合、まず{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な体力{/g}が差し引かれ、続いて通常の体力が差し引かれる。
一時的な傷は通常、戦闘が終了するまで、あるいはキャラクターがダメージを受けてその傷を失うまで残る。
キャラクターが複数のソースから一時的な傷を得ても、これらの一時的な傷は互いにスタックしない…そのキャラクターは、最も一時的な傷を負わせるソースからのみ利益をえる。
languages.original_text:
Additional {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} granted by certain effects and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. When a character suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in combat, {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are deducted first, followed by the character's regular wounds.
Temporary wounds generally stay until the end of combat or until the character loses them by suffering damage.
When a character gains temporary wounds from multiple sources, these temporary wounds do not stack with each other — the character only benefits from the source that grants the most temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text:
特定の効果やアビリティによって追加で与えられる{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}。キャラクターが戦闘中にダメージを受けた場合、まず一時的な傷が差し引かれ、続いて通常の傷が差し引かれる。
一時的な傷は通常、戦闘終了時まで、あるいはキャラクターがダメージを受けてその傷を失うまで残る。
キャラクターが複数のソースから一時的な傷を得ても、これらの一時的な傷は互いにスタックしない。そのキャラクターは、最も一時的な傷を負わせるソースからのみ利益を得る。
